name: Regal
description:
Upcoming strategy RPG by a complete nobody!

Play as a negotiation-idealist commander of forces leading his army against his foes, who just so happen to be... his own brothers?

With attacks, magic skills, special castle skills, claimable neutral castles and interactions with retaliation-damage, fans of S/TRPGs will definitely enjoy. And if you're not a fan? Give it a shot anyway.

STILL IN DEVELOPMENT - GRAPHICS NOT FINAL - GAMEPLAY NOT FINAL - DEMO AVAILABLE ONLY

- Scroll down for CONTROLS -
